activities: This certification covers personal information that may be transferred from the EU regarding ModusLink Corporation’s:(i) current, former, and prospective employees in connection with the employment relationship between such employees and ModusLink; (ii) customers and their personnel in connection with the contractual relationship  for supply chain management services provided by ModusLink to such customers and (iii) third parties (such as service providers, suppliers, vendors and contractors) and their personnel in connection with the management and administration of the business relationships with such third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: TRUSTe Privacy Program http://www.truste.org/consumers/watchdog_complaint.php.
